Package program_1

Class fileManager

java.lang.Object
program_1.fileManager
public class fileManager extends Object
fileManager class is CRUDs all files and folders used in the project it is used as a central hub for all integrations with the file system and the files. There is one exception to the above in main where the SQL INSERTS of the data is performed for efficiency.
Author:
jordanprescott

  • Constructor Details

    • fileManager

      public fileManager()

  • Method Details

    • buildDB

      public static void buildDB()
      buildDB first loops through the path list checking if there is an existing database inside the folders if a database is found is deleted, if there is no data base found it moves on. Once all folders have been checked the a new database called tests.db is created inside ./lib/ for future reference in the program.

    • buildDirs

      public static void buildDirs()
      buildDirs Checks if the input and output folders exist as they are used in later in the program, if not create them.

    • getCSVs

      public static ArrayList getCSVs()
      getCSVs First loops through the Path list and checks for CSV file, if found the file is moved ./lib/input. Secondly it loops through the ./lib/input to get the new path of the file and add this path to ArrayList files. Finally the files array list is returned.
      Returns:
      ArrayList file contains paths of all CSV files

    • SQLQuery

      public static void SQLQuery(String q)
      SQLQuery Takes in an SQL query as a parameter type String and executes to database with no update. Used for creating tables and indices.
      Parameters:
      q - - query to executed to the db

    • writeErrors

      public static void writeErrors(ArrayList errors)
      writeErrors Takes in arrayLis of errors collected in main and writes them to a file for viewing later.
      Parameters:
      errors - - ArrayList of errors to be written errors.txt
